Coca Crystal Video Recordings and Papers
Coca Crystal Video Recordings and Papers
Patrick Kilpatrick, Nancy Boreman, Chris Young, Mike Chance
Patrick Kilpatrick, Nancy Boreman, Chris Young, Mike Chance

This episode features a poem by Vincent Titus, Beanie the Singing Dog, Leslie Kandell, a video about the purity of wine by Patrick Kilpatrick, news with Nancy Boreman, an interview with Chris Young, and a pot poll with Mike Chance answering viewer phone calls.
